scripts.dev: bun run dev:backend & bun run dev:frontend
scripts.build: bun run --cwd backend build && bun run --cwd frontend build
scripts.lint: bun run --cwd backend lint && bun run --cwd frontend lint
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run build
scripts.lint:fix: bun run --cwd backend lint:fix && bun run --cwd frontend lint:fix
scripts.format: bun run --cwd backend format && bun run --cwd frontend format
scripts.docs:verify: bun run --cwd backend docs:bundle && test -f backend/docs/generated/openapi.yaml
